metadata.title: CVE-2022-38150 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In Varnish Cache 7.0.0, 7.0.1, 7.0.2, and 7.1.0, it is possible to causethe Varnish Server to assert and automatically restart through forgedHTTP/1 backend responses. An attack uses a crafted reason phrase of thebackend response status line. This is fixed in 7.0.3 and 7.1.1.

criterions.comment: varnish package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
